page.title: 12NETHER GREEN STORES,UNSTONE.
page.content: George Vaughan & wife, proprietors. At shop 14 yrs. Sells foods, household goods, stationery, etc. 5\ days p.w. Three part-time staff. "It saves customers having to go into nearby towns to buy these things.I also run a Ford lorry, 17 yrs.old, to carry greengroceries, fruit, & general items. Four days a week Tues.,Wed., Fri.,Sat. Never more than a mile from village.I serve the old people. Saves them having to go to town. Disadvant- ages of open lorry, I get rained, snowed, blowed on in winter, but it's nice in summer. "On Mon. & Thurs. have to go to towns to cash & carries, wholesalers and markets to buy. "See problems in future trading. Supermarkets taking over from us. Our business continually shrinking. Eventually may not be here at all."
